{"id":1227998280,"question_id":3387,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1712693841,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"29 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1227998280/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Operations to Make Median of Array Equal to K","memory":"62.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long minOperationsToMakeMedianK(int[] nums, int k) {\n        Arrays.sort(nums);\n        int n = nums.length;\n        long count = 0;\n\n        int mid = n/2;\n\n        if(nums[mid] < k){\n            for(int i=mid;i<n;i++){\n                if(nums[i]<k){\n                    count+=k-nums[i];\n                }else{\n                    break;\n                }\n            }\n        }else if(nums[mid]>k){\n            for(int i=mid;i>=0;i--){\n                if(nums[i]>k){\n                    count+=nums[i]-k;\n                }else{\n                    break;\n                }\n            }\n        }else{\n            count = 0;\n        }\n\n        return count;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-operations-to-make-median-of-array-equal-to-k","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
